snippet: A court sentenced four fish farmers to prison on Friday after finding them guilty of attempted murder for fighting an eviction squad with homemade guns and land mines last year.
abstract: Vietnamese court sentences four fish farmers to prison after finding them guilty of attempted murder for fighting eviction from their land with homemade guns and land mines in 2012.
lead_paragraph: A court sentenced four fish farmers to prison on Friday after finding them guilty of attempted murder for fighting an eviction squad with homemade guns and land mines last year.

headline.seo: Vietnamese Farmers Sentenced to Prison for Resisting Eviction
headline.main: Vietnam: Farmers Sentenced to Prison for Resisting Eviction
headline.print_headline: Vietnam: Farmers Sentenced to Prison For Resisting Eviction From Their Land
